name: Less Tutorial
tagline: This tutorial will help you to setup less development environment and each functionality of less
body: ### Welcome to Less Tutorial This is a tutorial that is made for the people though who they are new to UI Development. Less is a css preprocessor to help developer to save time in development and write bug and hassle free css codes that is easy to modify and compiled ### Steps to setup Less Environment * Install Node js(As per your ease of development) * open command prompt * Initialize npm(npm init) * You have to create a package.json file in which put name version and all other detials. * To install Less (npm install less) *Install this globally and you'll have access to the grunt command anywhere on your system. *npm install -g grunt-cli * A Grunt.js file will be generated in your working directory * create less file (eg. style.less) write your css in less format. * For compilation enter grunt and press enter your css file will get generated ### Authors and Contributors I have published this tutorial because i have faced problem at the time of my learinign so though i should share this tutorial that can help new people. contributorâ€™s Profile. In 2013, by Manoj Shukla.
